mapper.select: SELECT s.*, c.name AS class_name, gl.name AS grade_level_name, m.name AS major_name, d.name AS department_name FROM studentms.student s LEFT JOIN studentms.class c ON s.class_id = c.id LEFT JOIN studentms.grade_level gl ON s.grade_level_id = gl.id LEFT JOIN studentms.major m ON s.major_id = m.id LEFT JOIN studentms.department d ON s.department_id = d.id ORDER BY s.id

mapper.update: UPDATE studentms.student SET student_no = #{student.studentNo}, sname = #{student.sname}, password = #{student.password}, class_id = #{student.classId}, grade_level_id = #{student.gradeLevelId}, major_id = #{student.majorId}, department_id = #{student.departmentId} WHERE id = #{student.id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO studentms.student (student_no, sname, password, class_id, grade_level_id, major_id, department_id) VALUES (#{student.studentNo}, #{student.sname}, #{student.password}, #{student.classId}, #{student.gradeLevelId}, #{student.majorId}, #{student.departmentId})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT d.id AS id, d.name AS name FROM studentms.student s INNER JOIN studentms.department d ON s.department_id = d.id WHERE s.department_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY d.id
